      • setMultBounds

        public void setMultBounds(int BoundSize,
                          int boundLegX,
                          int boundLegY,
                          int boundLeftX,
                          int boundLeftY,
                          int boundRightX,
                          int boundRightY,
                          int boundHeadX,
                          int boundHeadY)
        Set up 5 different bounds on the sprite In the future, this should be a very different method when bounds become their own seperate class with which contains all of these many variables in simpler form. Instead, this method will be instantiating and adding another bound to the list of bounds on a sprite.

        Initially, the legBoundX and legBoundY is the currently selected bound for the sprite to use in collision

        Parameters:
        BoundSize - - width * height of the bound
        boundLegX - - x position of this bound
        boundLegY - - y position of this bound
        boundLeftX - - x position of this bound
        boundLeftY - - y position of this bound
        boundRightX - - x position of this bound
        boundRightY - - y position of this bound
        boundHeadX - - x position of this bound
        boundHeadY - - y position of this bound

      • setCollided

      • lifespan

        public int lifespan()
        Lifespan related methods

        lifespan and lifeage are used to defin the possibility of a sprite getting taken out of the system after a period of time known as the lifespan. Each update after the sprite is created, lifeage goes up by 1. If lifeage becomes greater than lifespan, the sprite is killed and taken out of the system. This is done every update.

        It is also possible to set the lifespan or lifeage at a time after the sprite has begun existing

        Returns:
        - Int lifespan or lifeage

      • setLifespan

        public void setLifespan(int life)

      • lifeage

        public int lifeage()

      • setLifeage

        public void setLifeage(int age)
